roleset.name: wrap
roleset.note: TWINE-V NOTES: Member of VNcls coil-9.6. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from twine.01-v)

example.name: sorta like 'create'
example.text: Hence the title of the book, referring to the soldiers and subjects of the king; on the fatal battlefield of Poltava, to quote from the novel, ``the wreath [0]-1 he twined [*T*-1]for himself slipped down upon his people''.

example.name: with location
example.text: We'd know him by his stretch pants and the flowers [0]-1 he'd wear [*T*-1]-2 twined [*]-2 in his hair.

example.name: canonically with 'around'
example.text: It enclosed her clammy hands and twined around her ankles.
